sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Form, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import { createBill } from '../../redux/actions/bill/billAction' function AddBill() { const [billNo, setBillNo] = useState(""); const [productKey, setProductKey] = useState("") const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(0) const dispatch = useDispatch(); const formSubmitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(createBill(billNo, productKey, quantity)) setQuantity(0) setProductKey("") } return (
Bill Number setBillNo(e.target.value)} /> Product Key setProductKey(e.target.value)} /> Quantity setQuantity(e.target.value)} />
) } export default AddBill
